1.content: First, let's select the type of character we want to belly up!
1.title: Select a Character

11.content: What age do we want our subject to be?
11.title: Human Male

111.content:
Brandon: 6 years old, a bit chubby, brown hair, average height, Caucasian

Brandon wants to be just like his daddy when he grows up! His daddy just happens to be a pretty big guy. Will Brandon's dad support his son's goals?

Peter: 12 years old, thick, blonde, tall for his age, Caucasian

Peter is a linebacker for his town's football team. His teammates have made a game of stuffing him after games to help him grow nice and big for the team!
111.title: Kid (12 years and under)

115.content:
Paul: 68 years old, obese, gray hair, Caucasian

Paul has spent his whole life secretly wishing he could be fat. Now that his golden years are upon him and nothing left to tie him down, he's decided to go full throttle into gaining!

Raul: 70 years old, thin, black hair, Hispanic

Raul's very close with his grandsons, who love their grandfather and love to keep him happy and fed!
115.title: Older Adult (50+)

15.title: Animal

info.brief_description: Weight Gain and expansion stories that focus on belly growth
info.description:
This is, yes, ANOTHER weight gain/expansion interactive for your pleasure. This one, however, focuses mainly on characters who only seem to put on pounds and inches on to their bellies! As our characters grow and/or fatten up, make sure the belly is the primary focus. Let's make some hyper-guts!

Allowed:
-Weight Gain
-Inflation
-Hyper-cock/balls
-Any ages
-Furry/Animal
-Sex (gay or straight)
-Minor slob
-Light vore
-Biiiiiiig bellies!

Discouraged:
-Scat
-Intense vore
-Gore
-Death
-Rape
-Popping
-Excessive micro/macro or growth of a non-belly body part (to the point where that becomes the focus)
-Kinkshaming
